verbs.description: unshorten (third-person singular simple present unshortens, present participle unshortening, simple past and past participle unshortened)

entries.meaning: (rare, transitive, chiefly computing) To expand from an abbreviated form; to restore to its original length.
examples: The following is a snippet from the UnShortEmAll Greasemonkey script, which unshortens the shortened URLs in Twitter  […]
